meanings.definition: The act of looking at something again.
meanings.sent1: After the movie ended, the relooking at the plot helped me understand it better.
meanings.sent2: I did a relooking at my notes to find the missing information.
meanings.sent3: The relooking at the puzzle made me realize I had missed a piece.
meanings.sent4: Her relooking at the old photograph brought back memories of her childhood.
meanings.sent5: The relooking at the map revealed a hidden path through the forest.

meanings.definition: The act of changing or updating one's appearance or style.
meanings.sent1: She decided to do a relooking to feel more confident in her new job.
meanings.sent2: The relooking of the living room involved painting the walls and getting new furniture.
meanings.sent3: His relooking for the party made him look like a completely different person.
meanings.sent4: The relooking of the website gave it a fresh and modern look.
meanings.sent5: The relooking of her wardrobe made her realize she had too many clothes she never wore.
